name: Busy Bee (neonpixls)
description:
This was made as the final project for Create with Code Summer Live Session 2020.

You play as a busy Bee.

Collect Flowers, fill honeycombs and eliminate or avoid enemy bees. 

Be careful, if you touch an enemy bee you are dead. 

How to play: 

W/A/S/D to move your character. 

Space Bar to shoot honey.
